title: Open Qualifiers
body:
I would like to know if there is an open qualifier that happens inbetween the spring and summer splits for NA CS? The information that is presently shown in the "About" tab for the NA CS is at best outdated or simply going to a broken link when it comes to trying to get any information on where the open tournaments are going to be held. 

Thanks to anyone that can get some accurate information my way.

replies.body:
We do actually have an article up where you can get all the info on our NA CS Summer Open Qualifiers on lolesports. You can find it [here](http://www.lolesports.com/en_US/articles/2017-na-cs-summer-qualifiers).

The reason you see so little on the tournament itself is because we actually use [Battlegrounds](https://battlegrounds.leagueoflegends.com/na) to host the event. Everything you need should be available on one of those 2 sites, but if you have more questions you can hit me up on Twitter (@RiotIceChest).
